refnamediv.refpurpose: A singleton object which catches SIGCHLD signals and converts them into GObject-style "child-exited" signals.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Because an application may need to be notified when child processes exit, and because there is only one SIGCHLD handler, the VteTerminal widget relies on a VteReaper to watch for SIGCHLD notifications and retrieve the exit status of child processes which have exited. When glib provides child_watch functionality, the VteReaper merely acts as a proxy for glib's own functionality.
